what_is_pandoras.title: The Pandora Manifesto
what_is_pandoras.description: We believe that work must be rewarded, not just investment. Digital property is not a 'ticker'... it is a right to participation. Transparency is not a 'feature'... it is the foundation of trust. We are the natural evolution of creator communities.

problem_we_solve.title: The Problem We Solve
problem_we_solve.problem_1: Communities with limited participation and artificial engagement.
problem_we_solve.problem_2: Technical barriers that prevent launching incentive systems.
problem_we_solve.problem_3: Centralized platforms that turn creators into mercenaries for others' businesses.
problem_we_solve.solution: Pandora's solution: sovereign communities, no-code accessible tools, real digital ownership.

benefits_market.main_title: The Seven Seals of the Digital Box
benefits_market.main_description: We discover the artifacts that keep your community's participation dormant. It's time to unleash their true potential!
benefits_market.ventajas_description0: Passive communities, dormant engagement, members who don't awaken. The awakening: Incentive Protocols (Work-to-Earn). Reward your community for the work that AWAKENS their creative essence.
benefits_market.ventajas_description1: Labyrinths of development, costs that devour resources, fear of smart contracts. The awakening: No-Code Platform. Unleash your utility protocol in minutes, not months of confusion.
benefits_market.ventajas_title2: Seal 3: The Artifact of Third-Party Control
benefits_market.ventajas_description2: Your community lives in third-party platforms (Discord/Patreon/Facebook). You are not the guardian, others control the rules and devour the 30%. The awakening: Community Crystals (NFTs). Grant your members real and sovereign property.
benefits_market.ventajas_title3: The Awakening: Your Creation Palette Web3
benefits_market.ventajas_description3: You don't need to be a 'blockchain mage' to have a Web3 community. We empower you with the necessary crystals to forge systems of incentives that flourish. Make your community COME ALIVE!

faqs.question: What is Pandora’s Finance and how does it work?
faqs.answer: It's a platform to invest in fractions of properties and startups: you register, get an access right, and participate in legally backed investment rounds.

faqs.question: How do I invest and how much do I need?
faqs.answer: Sign up, claim your access, and choose a project. The minimum varies per offer; you can pay in fiat or stablecoins depending on each project.

faqs.question: How do you protect my money?
faqs.answer: Funds are held in trust/escrow, operations are on smart contracts with multisig validation; the legal structure is detailed in each offer.

faqs.question: What returns can I expect and what are the risks?
faqs.answer: Returns depend on the project (rent, appreciation, sale). Risks include construction, market, regulatory, and liquidity. There are no guarantees.

faqs.question: When and how do I receive my return or can I exit?
faqs.answer: Payments follow the project's schedule (e.g., quarterly or at closing). Early exits may be allowed via a secondary market or transfers, subject to conditions and potential penalties.

welcome.title: Welcome to Pandora's Finance
welcome.content: These terms and conditions govern the access and use of our digital platform and DApp, available at https://dapp.pandoras.finance/, as well as tokenization services, real estate participation purchases, and digital rights.

definitions.title: Definitions
items: Platform: DApp and digital services by Pandoras.
Users: Natural or legal persons who access and use the services.
Real Estate Rights (NFTs): Digital assets that grant access to purchase real estate participations.
Real Estate Participations: Digital fractions representing a real estate asset.
Tokenization: Process of representing a real asset on blockchain through digital tokens.

usage.title: Platform Usage
items: The Platform allows you to acquire Real Estate Rights (NFTs) for free, which grants access to purchase Real Estate Participations in selected projects.
Users must have a compatible digital wallet to interact with the Platform.
Pandoras is not a financial advisor and offers no guarantees on the profitability of investments made on the Platform.

responsibility.title: Responsibility and Warranty Disclaimer
items: Pandoras is not responsible for losses, risks, or value fluctuations of digitalized assets on the Platform.
The Platform operates on blockchain, therefore all transactions are irreversible and cannot be modified once confirmed.
Users accept that ownership of a Real Estate Right (NFT) does not equate to ownership of the physical property.
The Platform reserves the right to modify, update, or suspend any service without prior notice.

requirements.title: User Requirements
items: Must be over 18 years old to use the Platform.
Agrees to comply with tax regulations in their country of residence.
Pandoras reserves the right to deny access to any user if suspicious activity is detected.

payments.title: Payments and Fees
items: Payments are made exclusively in cryptocurrencies or through approved methods.
Pandoras may charge fees for the use of certain services.
No refunds are offered once a token or participation purchase is completed.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection and Security
items: Personal data is processed according to our Privacy Policy.
The user is responsible for their account and credentials security.
Pandoras is not responsible for unauthorized access due to user negligence.

law.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
items: These Terms are governed by Mexican law.
Any disputes will be resolved in competent courts in Mexico City, Mexico.

acceptance.title: Terms and Conditions Acceptance
acceptance.content: By using the platform, you acknowledge having read and understood these Terms and Privacy Policy, accepting their compliance without reservations.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Pandora's, we are committed to protecting our users' privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our Platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
items: Personal information: Name, email, digital wallet address.
Transaction information: Purchase history and movements.
Technical data: IP address, browser type, cookie data.

usage.title: Use of Information
items: Process transactions and manage user accounts.
Improve Platform security and functionality.
Send communications about changes and updates.
Comply with applicable legal and tax regulations.

protection.title: Information Protection
items: We implement technical and organizational security measures.
Information stored on blockchain is immutable and transparent.
We don't sell personal information to third parties without consent.

rights.title: User Rights
items: Access, modify or delete your stored personal information.
Request account cancellation.
Opt out of promotional communications.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
items: We use cookies to improve user experience.
Secure and persistent session authentication.
Behavior and navigation analysis.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Due to the decentralized nature of blockchain technology, some data may be processed outside Mexico. We ensure compliance with applicable data protection regulations in all jurisdictions.

changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes through the Platform or email.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions or requests about data privacy, please contact us at:

info_modal.title: About Our Marketplace
info_modal.paragraph1: Our marketplace connects investors with real and tokenized digital assets, offering a new way to participate in the global economy. Here you don't just explore opportunities: you access real estate projects, startups, and businesses backed by tangible assets and solid legal structures. Every investment is managed with blockchain transparency, protecting your capital and facilitating liquidity through stablecoins and DeFi tools.
info_modal.paragraph2: With Pandoras, investing is no longer exclusive to large corporations: now you can diversify your portfolio, participate with accessible amounts, and receive returns generated by the real economy. Our platform guides you from start to finish: from project selection and analysis to the management of your tokenized assets, all within a secure, regulated ecosystem designed to grow with you.

section1.title: Take control of your financial future
section1.content: Select an asset, review its information, and start your investment process in minutes. Each project is accompanied by clear and updated metrics so you can make decisions with confidence.

section2.title: Transparency and continuous monitoring
section2.content: We conduct periodic audits and offer a real-time monitoring system that guarantees the quality of each investment. Thus, your portfolio grows backed by data and proven security.

tokenization_process.subtitle: Transparency, analysis, and blockchain technology at the service of your investment

steps.title: Initial evaluation and selection
steps.description: We analyze each candidate project (real estate, startups, companies) with financial viability, impact, and projection criteria.

steps.title: Due Diligence and legality
steps.description: We verify documents, regulatory compliance, and legal structure to ensure that each asset complies with applicable regulations.

steps.title: Tokenization and RWA backing
steps.description: We convert the asset into secure digital units through audited smart contracts, backed by tangible assets.

steps.title: Platform publication
steps.description: Once approved, the project is integrated into the marketplace so that investors can participate directly and securely.

steps.title: Continuous monitoring and performance
steps.description: We monitor the evolution of each project, ensuring transparency, scheduled payments, and updated reports.

about.title: About Pandora's Finance: Digitizing Real-World Value

the_big_why.title: Our Big Why
the_big_why.p1: In a world where the best investment opportunities are often reserved for a few, billions of dollars in value remain trapped in illiquid assets like real estate and startups. Complexity, bureaucracy, and high barriers to entry prevent most people from participating in their growth.
the_big_why.p2: Pandora's Finance was born from a fundamental question: What if we could unlock that value? What if we could make investing in an apartment building or a promising startup as simple as buying a stock?
the_big_why.p3: Our 'big why' is the democratization of access to wealth. We believe in a financial future where anyone, from anywhere, can invest in tangible, high-growth assets safely, transparently, and efficiently, all through the power of blockchain technology.

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.content: Our mission is to build and operate the most robust technological, legal, and financial infrastructure for the tokenization of Real-World Assets (RWA). We connect owners of high-quality assets with a global community of investors, generating liquidity for the former and competitive yield opportunities for the latter. We do this through a platform that ensures security, regulatory compliance, and an exceptional user experience.

what_we_do.title: What We Do
what_we_do.intro: Pandora's Finance is an end-to-end tokenization platform. Currently, our main focus is the real estate sector, but we are expanding our model to include startups in the medium term.

services.title: Advisory and Legal Structuring
services.description: We create the legal and fiduciary framework to convert a physical asset into a series of digital tokens representing its value.

services.title: Technological Development
services.description: We program and audit the smart contracts that govern the ownership, management, and transfer of the tokens.

services.title: Value-Added Services
services.description: We offer key services such as project incubation, due diligence, digital marketing, and community management to ensure the success of each tokenization.

our_current_position.title: Our Current Position
our_current_position.intro: We are not just an idea; we are a growing reality. As of today, Pandora's Finance has:
points: A basic tokenization platform already operational.
A solidly established legal and brand structure.
Signed clients who are ready to start their tokenization processes on our platform.

the_team.title: The Team Behind Pandora's
the_team.intro: We have a management and operational team that covers all critical areas for success:

areas.title: Technology and Product (CTO, CPO, Developers)
areas.description: Experts in blockchain, smart contracts, and the development of secure and scalable platforms.

areas.title: Finance and Legal (CFO, Legal Representative)
areas.description: Specialists in financial management, regulatory compliance, and crypto-asset structuring.

areas.title: Marketing and Sales (CMO, Executives)
areas.description: A dedicated team to build our brand, attract new projects, and manage our network of agents (TXAgents).

strategic_allies.title: Our Strategic Allies
strategic_allies.intro: We understand that trust is the cornerstone of finance. Therefore, we have built an ecosystem of alliances with leaders in their respective fields to ensure maximum security and compliance:

categories.name: Blockchain Technology
categories.partners: We integrate decentralized oracles like Chainlink and payment gateways like Transak for seamless operation.

categories.name: Audit and Security
categories.partners: We collaborate with firms like CertiK and PeckShield for security and smart contract audits, and we use secure contract libraries from OpenZeppelin.

categories.name: Compliance (KYC/AML)
categories.partners: We use identity verification services from market leaders.

categories.name: Legal and Financial Advisory
categories.partners: We are backed by law firms to support us financially.

categories.name: Commercial Alliances
categories.partners: We are members of the Mexican Association of Real Estate Professionals (AMPI) to stay at the forefront of the real estate sector.

roadmap.title: Future Vision - Our Roadmap
roadmap.intro: We are in a phase of accelerated growth with a clear plan for the coming months.

timeline.description: We will launch our enhanced DApp, complete the first tokenizations for our initial clients, and begin paying the first profits to investors.
We will expand to new key markets like Guadalajara and Monterrey and launch our first 'Pandoras Pro' pilot for the tokenization of a startup, turning it into a DAO.

cta.title: Join the Digital Asset Revolution
cta.content: Whether you are an asset owner seeking liquidity, an investor looking for new opportunities, or a potential partner who shares our vision, we want to hear from you.
